price: There will be sent against you a flame of fire and smoke[9], and you will not be able to defend yourselves.
arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
footnotes: [9] It could also mean liquefied brass or copper.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
